title: Design of a new palladium(II) halide complex as a bio-active material: synthesis, physico-chemical studies, DFT-computations and evaluation of anti-inflammatory, antioxidant and anti-gastric damage activities
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17413-17433
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02984D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sarra Bougossa, Noureddine Mhadhbi, Ali Ben Ahmed, Mohamed Hamdi, Kais Elghniji, Jeanneau Erwann, Khaled Hamden, Abderrazek Oueslati, Houcine Naïli
A new Pd(II) complex has been prepared at room temperature. It was characterized by SC-XRD, UV-vis spectroscopy, photoluminescence, thermal analysis, cyclic voltammetry, dielectric measurements and biological activities.
